Create a new coordinate system at 0.0, 0.0, 0.3 with euler angles of 0.0, 0.0, 0.0. Draw the first face of the prism as follows: * Loop 1: + Line 1: Start Point (0.0, 0.0), End Point (0.15, 0.0) + Line 2: Start Point (0.15, 0.0), End Point (0.15, 0.75) + Line 3: Start Point (0.15, 0.75), End Point (0.0, 0.75) + Line 4: Start Point (0.0, 0.75), End Point (0.0, 0.0) Extrude the sketch towards the opposite normal direction by 0.15 units, creating a flat top and bottom and cutting into Part 1. Draw the first face of the cylinder as follows: * Loop 1: + Circle 1: Center (0.1, 0.1), Radius 0.1 Extrude the sketch towards the opposite normal direction by 1.25 units, cutting into Part 1 and Part 2, creating a cylindrical hole. This CAD model consists of a rectangular prism with a cylindrical hole in the center.
